trans-unit.source: Scenario 4 - Restore of a Damaged Replica (locally)

seg-source.mrk: Scenario 4 - Restore of a Damaged Replica (locally)

target.mrk: Scénario 4 - Restauration d’une réplique endommagée (en local)

trans-unit.source: The diagram (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_scenario4" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) illustrates <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> when restoring a damaged replica.

seg-source.mrk: The diagram (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_scenario4" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) illustrates <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> when restoring a damaged replica.

target.mrk: Le schéma (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_scenario4" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) illustre le <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> lors de la restauration d'une réplique endommagée.

seg-source.mrk: Scenario 4

target.mrk: Scénario 4

seg-source.mrk: Prerequisites

target.mrk: Conditions préalables

trans-unit.source: Do not run any <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> backups during the restore

seg-source.mrk: Do not run any <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> backups during the restore

target.mrk: Ne pas lancer de sauvegardes <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> pendant la restauration.

seg-source.mrk: Hypothesis

target.mrk: Hypothèses

seg-source.mrk: HyperStream_B replicated to HyperStream_A.

target.mrk: HyperStream_B est répliqué sur HyperStream_A.

trans-unit.source: Replication can be comprised of several <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> s and HyperStream _A can receive streams from another source (part of the replica ring), we must not assume that HyperStream_A=HyperStream_B.

seg-source.mrk: Replication can be comprised of several <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> s and HyperStream _A can receive streams from another source (part of the replica ring), we must not assume that HyperStream_A=HyperStream_B.

target.mrk: La réplication peut être constituée de plusieurs serveurs <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et il est possible que HyperStream_A reçoive des flux provenant d’une autre source (faisant partie d’une réplication circulaire). Il ne faut pas supposer que HyperStream_A = HyperStream_B.

alt-trans.seg-source: Replication can be comprised of several <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />s and HyperStream _A can receive streams from another source (part of the replica ring), we must not assume that HyperStream_A=HyperStream_B.
alt-trans.target: La réplication peut être constituée de plusieurs <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et il est possible que HyperStream_A reçoive des flux provenant d’une autre source (faisant partie d’une réplication circulaire). Il ne faut pas supposer que HyperStream_A est identique à HyperStream_B.

seg-source.mrk: Procedure

target.mrk: Procédure

trans-unit.source: If HyperStream_B is still running, stop HyperStream_B

seg-source.mrk: If HyperStream_B is still running, stop HyperStream_B

target.mrk: Si HyperStream B tourne toujours, arrêtez HyperStream B.

seg-source.mrk: Recreate HyperStream_B:

target.mrk: Recréez le serveur HyperStream.

trans-unit.source: >ade_server --reset --force. This command totally removes all data.

seg-source.mrk: >ade_server --reset --force.
This command totally removes all data.

target.mrk: >ade_server --reset --force.
Cette commande supprime complètement l'ensemble des données.

trans-unit.source: If step 2 fails, for instance if the database cannot be recovered, launch this command:

seg-source.mrk: If step 2 fails, for instance if the database cannot be recovered, launch this command:

target.mrk: Si le step 2 échoue, par exemple si la base de données ne peut être récupérée, exécutez cette commande :

seg-source.mrk: >ade_server --recover <config_backup_path> --force

target.mrk: >ade_server --recover <config_backup_path> --force

seg-source.mrk: Start HyperStream_B.

target.mrk: Démarrez HyperStream_B.

trans-unit.source: At this point, HyperStream_B will be empty but will be populated by the replication resync operation. Streams will start to return from HyperStream_A. The logs will show this activity. Please note this procedure may take some time (especially if A and B are using a WAN connection).

seg-source.mrk: At this point, HyperStream_B will be empty but will be populated by the replication resync operation.
Streams will start to return from HyperStream_A.
The logs will show this activity.
Please note this procedure may take some time (especially if A and B are using a WAN connection).

target.mrk: A la fin de la procédure, HyperStream_B est vide mais sera rempli par l’opération de resynchronisation de la réplication.
Les flux seront envoyés par HyperStream_A.
Les logs montreront cette activité.
Cette procédure peut être longue, en particulier si A et B utilisent une connexion WAN.
